I used version 20020125 (eclipse) and 20020116 from CDT. - From CDT I used only
the cdt-eclipse-20020116-local.zip.

You are using Eclipse Version 2.0.  The CDT that you're using is only for 
Eclipse Version 1.0.  In particular the editor for version 1.0 uses different 
APIs for Version 2.0.  We will be putting out a version that supports Eclipse 
2.0 shortly but, in the meantime, you will need to use Eclipse 1.0.
